summary: Comprehensive pre-deployment testing completed for Dashboard Digital Program Agro Mopomulo. All 32 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI tests passed for all public pages (10 menu) and admin pages (9 menu). All CRUD operations, filters, exports, and form submissions working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: Health check endpoint
Backend: Admin login with credentials admin@gorontaloutara.go.id / Admin123!
Backend: Admin login rejects invalid credentials
Backend: GET /api/auth/me with valid token
Backend: GET /api/opd returns all OPD list
Backend: POST /api/opd creates OPD with kategori (OPD/DESA/KECAMATAN/PUBLIK)
Backend: PUT /api/opd/{id} updates OPD
Backend: DELETE /api/opd/{id} removes OPD
Backend: GET /api/partisipasi returns all partisipasi with opd_nama
Backend: POST /api/partisipasi creates partisipasi (public endpoint)
Backend: Partisipasi rejects invalid OPD ID
Backend: GET /api/settings returns settings with berita_popup_interval
Backend: PUT /api/settings updates settings including tentang fields
Backend: GET /api/stats returns statistics
Backend: GET /api/progress returns progress per OPD with target calculation
Backend: GET /api/agenda returns all agenda
Backend: GET /api/agenda/upcoming returns upcoming/ongoing agenda
Backend: POST /api/agenda creates agenda with status 'upcoming'
Backend: PUT /api/agenda/{id} updates agenda status
Backend: GET /api/berita returns all berita
Backend: GET /api/berita/active returns active berita for popup
Backend: POST /api/berita creates berita with is_active=true
Backend: PUT /api/berita/{id} toggles is_active status
Backend: GET /api/gallery returns gallery items
Backend: POST /api/gallery creates gallery item
Backend: GET /api/edukasi returns edukasi items
Backend: POST /api/edukasi creates edukasi
Backend: PUT /api/edukasi/{id} updates edukasi
Backend: GET /api/export/excel exports Excel file
Backend: GET /api/export/pdf exports PDF file
Frontend: HomePage loads with hero section, stats cards, agenda, berita sections
Frontend: Public navigation works (10 menu items)
Frontend: Partisipasi form multi-step with kategori dropdown (OPD/Desa/Kecamatan/Publik)
Frontend: Partisipasi form has manual coordinate inputs and GPS button
Frontend: Admin login works with provided credentials
Frontend: Admin Dashboard shows stats, OPD chart (vertical), partisipasi terbaru
Frontend: Admin sidebar has 9 menu items
Frontend: Admin OPD page has CRUD, Import Excel with kategori selection
Frontend: Admin Partisipasi page has Kategori filter, OPD filter, Cek Lokasi button
Frontend: Admin Laporan page has Export Excel/PDF, Progress table with color-coded bars
Frontend: Admin Settings page has 3 tabs (Branding, Hero Section, Tentang)
seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up automatically by pytest fixtures
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pre-deployment testing completed successfully. All features working: Public pages (Beranda, Tentang, Kontribusi OPD, Peta Penanaman, Agenda, Berita, Galeri, Edukasi, Partisipasi), Admin pages (Dashboard, Kelola OPD, Kelola Partisipasi, Laporan, Kelola Galeri, Kelola Edukasi, Kelola Agenda, Kelola Berita, Pengaturan). Progress bar colors: 1-50% red, 51-70% yellow, 71-100% green. Kategori system (OPD/DESA/KECAMATAN/PUBLIK) working across all features.

public_pages.beranda: Stats, Agenda Penanaman, Berita Terbaru, NewsPopup working
public_pages.berita: List with search and modal detail working
public_pages.partisipasi: Multi-step form with kategori dropdown, manual coordinates, GPS button working

admin_pages.dashboard: Stats cards, vertical OPD chart, partisipasi terbaru working
admin_pages.kelola_opd: CRUD, Import Excel with kategori selection working
admin_pages.kelola_partisipasi: Kategori filter, OPD filter, Cek Lokasi button working
admin_pages.laporan: Export Excel/PDF, Progress table with color-coded bars working
admin_pages.pengaturan: Logo upload, Hero section, Tentang content working
